summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Graham Street, from Empire Way to Beacon Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 11840 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds" and declaring an emergency.
